body.p: Princeton, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Louisa A. Conway. Father of Mary B. Conway, Fidelia Caroline Conway, Francis A. Conway, William P. Conway, Henry J. Conway, and Albert B. Conway. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1850 and four in 1860.
